description: '''Dheena Chandra Dhas''' (born in [[Madras]] (now Chennai), India, on 1 August 1956) is an actor, singer, [[voice over artist]] and [[sound engineer]]. He is the youngest of 4 brothers and the younger brother of the well-known 70s musician [[Madhukar C. Dhas]]. He lives in [[Kodaikanal]], [[Tamil Nadu]], India, and does Voice Overs in his home-studio.
